mdRecord.dcterms:title: Military map of Suffolk and vicinity / for Brig. Gen. E.L. Viele ; surveyed and drawn by Oscar Soederquist, Lieut, 99th N.Y. Vol. ; Julius Bien & Co. Lith., N.Y.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Soederquist, Oscar.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by hachures and pictorially.
Shows fortifications, houses, names of residents, roads, railroads, and drainage.
From: Atlas to accompany the Official records of the Union and Confederate armies, 1861-1865, Plate XXVI.

Insets: Plan of Fort Esperanza, Tex. -- Map of Morris Island and the adjacent creeks : from U.S. Coast Survey, 1823-4, sand hills from a survey 6th June, 1862 : accompanying indorsement [sic] of Gen. G.T. Beauregard. (Scale ca. 1:22,000) -- Proposed secondary line of defense on the peninsula between Ashepoo and Combahee rivers, S.C., November 4, 1863 : accompanying letter from Brig. Gen. W.S. Walker. (Scale ca. 1:53,000)
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: several tears, with some loss of text; old tape repairs.
